name: Long Bow
description: Long Bows are used for long distances and are lethal when used by elphs

name: Short Bow
description: Short Bows are fast but short ranged. Hunt a rat or something.

name: Long Sword
description: This sword is TOO heavy. It listens to Slipknot and similars.

name: Ancient Spellbook
description: Reading is mentaly healthy, but reading spells is deadly dangerous.

name: Official Mage Hat
description: You do look like a real mage with this turbo-amazing cool hat.

name: Gold Chain
description: U the one. U the f***ing one in the hood bro.

name: Gang Pistol
description: Hang carefully, could shoot without warning.

name: Grandma Knife
description: There is only scarier than your mum with a slipper, and that is your grandma with a knife when you do not eat all the food.

name: Grandpa Clock
description: Grandpa looking his clock is the most elegant thing a human can witness.

name: Computer Keyboard
description: Old computer keyboard used to slap faces in many 80s offices.

name: Furious Cat
description: Pet and take care of this animal like he was your son <3. He is lovely and scary. Named TOM.
